titles.title: Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-363.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 297.

action.text: Mr. Westerman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1727.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Westerman objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was considered as withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 427 - 2 (Roll no. 36).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 333.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary:
Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
This act extends the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission until October 1, 2031.
